SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.workspace

Class SelectionCapability

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBusPublisher
net.cnoga.paint.core.workspace.SelectionCapability
public class SelectionCapability extends EventBusPublisher
Handles selection, movement, rotation, copy/paste, and previewing of a rectangular portion of a workspace canvas.

Listens to selection-related events and manages an in-memory buffer for manipulations until the selection is committed.
